nodes.text: Gymelo was an astronomical object located within the Gymelo system, a part of the Bakura sector within the Outer Rim Territories and Wild Space.

In his youth, the Human Bix Arden-Govia left behind his pampered life on the nearby planet Bakura and signed on as a ship's boy aboard a freighter out of Gymelo. By 4 ABY, Arden-Govia, who had learned much about the worlds of the Shiritoku Spur region during his travels, had returned home on Bakura.

Gymelo was first mentioned in the Star Wars Roleplaying Game sourcebook Geonosis and the Outer Rim Worlds, which was published by Wizards of the Coast in 2004. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Gymelo system, and therefore the celestial body Gymelo, in grid square G-16.
